artist: Painter: attributed to Sumiyoshi Gukei; Artist: attributed to Sonchō Hoshinnō
description: unsigned; six scenes of monthly festivals; a.(July) Tanabata Festival, b.(August) Moon-viewing Party, c.(September) Cho_yo_ Festival d.(October) Maple-viewing Party, e.(November) Ohitaki Festival, f.(December) Preparing for the New Year
inscription:
Box cover, outside:

御巻物　二軸　[handscrolls, 2]

Box inscription (inside): 

寛政九巳五月精心院様為御(進 or 遺)物納候　　
[5th month of 1797 (Kansei 9), gift of Seishin\'in]

*Seishin\'in is someone in the house of Tokugawa Tsunayoshi

Attached paper below, inside box

詞書
尊朝親王御筆 [Calligraphy by Soncho Shinno]
画
住吉具慶筆 [Painting by Sumiyoshi Gukei]
とみえもうす候
medium: Ink, color, and gold on paper
title: Pleasures of the Twelve Months, part two [of a pair]
